meta.title: Golden Retriever Anxiety: Symptoms and Solutions
meta.description: Do Golden Retrievers get anxiety? Learn the signs and how to help your anxious Golden.

hero.title: Helping Your Anxious Golden Retriever
hero.subtitle: Goldens are social dogs, which makes them prone to separation anxiety.

symptoms_list: Pacing and panting when you prepare to leave
Destructive chewing on doors or windows
causes_list: Being left alone for too long

solutions_list.title: Increase Exercise
solutions_list.description: A tired dog is a calm dog. Ensure your Golden gets at least 60 minutes of activity.

solutions_list.title: Calming Supplements
solutions_list.description: CBD or natural chews can take the edge off.
